name: Gnome Settings
description: Quick access to Gnome Control Center panels

preferences.name: Background Sеttings
preferences.description: Change your background image to a wallpaper or photo

preferences.name: Bluetooth Settings
preferences.description: Turn Bluetooth on and off and connect your devices

preferences.name: Color Settings
preferences.description: Calibrate the colour of your devices, such as displays, cameras or printers

preferences.name: Date & Time Settings
preferences.description: Change the date and time, including time zone

preferences.name: Default Applications
preferences.description: Configure Default Applications

preferences.name: Display Settings
preferences.description: Choose how to use connected monitors and projectors

preferences.name: About Computer
preferences.description: View information about your system

preferences.name: Keyboard Settings
preferences.description: View and change keyboard shortcuts and set your typing preferences

preferences.name: Mouse Settings
preferences.description: Change your mouse or touchpad sensitivity and select right or left-handed

preferences.name: Network Settings
preferences.description: Control how you connect to the Internet

preferences.name: Notification Settings
preferences.description: Control which notifications are displayed and what they show

preferences.name: Online Accounts
preferences.description: Connect to your online accounts and decide what to use them for

preferences.name: Power & Battery Settings
preferences.description: View your battery status and change power saving settings

preferences.name: Printer Settings
preferences.description: Add printers, view printer jobs and decide how you want to print

preferences.name: Privacy Settings
preferences.description: Protect your personal information and control what others might see

preferences.name: Removable Media Settings
preferences.description: Configure Removable Media settings

preferences.name: Region & Language Settings
preferences.description: Select your display language, formats, keyboard layouts and input sources

preferences.name: Search Settings
preferences.description: Control which applications show search results in the Activities Overview

preferences.name: Sharing Settings
preferences.description: Control what you want to share with others

preferences.name: Sound Settings
preferences.description: Change sound levels, inputs, outputs, and alert sounds

preferences.name: Universal Access Settings
preferences.description: Make it easier to see, hear, type, point and click

preferences.name: User Accounts
preferences.description: Add or remove users and change your password

preferences.name: Wacom Tablet Settings
preferences.description: Set button mappings and adjust stylus sensitivity for graphics tablets

preferences.name: Wifi Settings
preferences.description: Control how you connect to Wi-Fi networks
